personal.title: Barber Management
personal.description: An ASP.NET MVC application developed for personal barber management and an appointment system that includes all barbers. It helps users track appointments and details. It also features AI that suggests hairstyles.

contributed.title: AGV Web and Mobile Interfaces
contributed.description: A project I developed for the team vehicle to be used in the Teknofest competition, showing customizable designs in real-time and providing ease of use.

contributed.title: Autonomous Vehicle Systems
contributed.description: Applications developed for each stage of the AGV project for the Teknofest competition. Real vehicle integration was completed.
